page.title: 06HOME LIFE
page.content: We interviewed people between the ages of 15 and 80 in Lingfield village. The majority of people interviewed were in the 65 and 80 age group and 75% of people questioned lived in Lingfield village itself. Children in the families questioned were aged between 1yr.and 18+,the majority being the latter. Firstly, we asked about family activities.We found that the majority of people eat only the Sunday lunch together as a family.The activity the family did most together was watching the television.We also discovered that only half the people questioned read for leisure. When questioned about household appliances owned we found that the highest percentage owned a washing machine, a fridge and a tumble drier followed by a vacuum cleaner, steam
